headlines.description: A drab encounter produced few chances and moments of quality, with Leicester profiting from an Everton mistake at the back to climb to seventh.
headlines.shortLinkText: Vardy strike sinks Everton in win for Leicester

headlines.description: Granit Xhaka, Alexandre Lacazette, Aaron Ramsey and Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang were all on target as Arsenal routed Fulham.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal thrash Fulham, close gap on Chelsea

headlines.description: First half goals from Harry Kane, Son Heung-min and Christian Eriksen saw Tottenham climb back above Manchester City into second.
headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs bounce back with easy win at Cardiff
